A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: From a life long fan..... (but not a fan that still has action figures in the box or cares or reads fan theory\, or books outside the movies) After the OK Force Awakens and the brilliant and original Rogue One\, this is simply a dumpster fire that burns everything to the ground. \n\nHalf a star only for the visual feast and action sequences.... because how hard is that in a Star Wars movie.
